title: Book cinema tickets for just £4 with Cineworld
description: CINEWORLD’S Big Screen Weekend is rolling out nationwide this weekend, where you can get cinema tickets for just £4 for all films in all formats, but hurry this is a limited time offer. On Saturday…
content:
Cineworld’s Big Screen Weekend: Two Days of Cinema Glory All films, all formats – all yours for just £4 a ticket

ONE TO WATCH Book cinema tickets for just £4 with Cineworld

CINEWORLD’S Big Screen Weekend is rolling out nationwide this weekend, where you can get cinema tickets for just £4 for all films in all formats, but hurry this is a limited time offer.

On Saturday, August 30 and Sunday August 31, every Cineworld cinema in the UK will transform into a two-day celebration of cinema’s biggest line-ups.

Think IMAX as the biggest stage of them all, 4DX as the only stage with wind machines, ScreenX as the panorama stage, and Superscreen so bright you will need sunscreen.

It is a two day takeover of every Cineworld nationwide, where every screen becomes a stage and every seat is the best in the house. Swap your wellies for Pepsies and send off summer with a cinematic bang - only at Cineworld.

From brand new headliners like Caught Stealing, Eddington, The Life of Chuck and The Roses, to the encore return of summer blockbusters including The Fantastic Four: First Steps, The Naked Gun, Weapons, Jurassic World: Rebirth, The Bad Guys 2, How To Train Your Dragon and more – this is cinema’s ultimate line-up.

Caught Stealing, Eddington, The Life of Chuck, The Roses and Nobody 2 - alongside the triumphant return of blockbuster season standouts like Fantastic Four: First Steps, Naked Gun, Weapons, Jurassic World: Rebirth, Superman, F1 and more.

IMAX – The Biggest stage of them all

Go big before summer ends with jaw-dropping scale and front-row-to-the-universe visuals. Across the UK and Ireland, Cineworld’s 26 IMAX screens are ready to deliver a summer finale you’ll feel in your bones, including the world-class IMAX with Laser at Cineworld Leicester Square – the West End’s only IMAX screen.

This Big Screen Weekend, the 4DX Arena at Cineworld is making waves, literally. Cool down with live spray, feel the gusts from wind machines and hang on as your seat does the crowd surfing for you. For the first time ever, you can experience Jaws in 4DX for only £4, with every splash, surge and shiver hitting you right in the face.

ScreenX – The only stage that surrounds you

With 270° panoramic screens, ScreenX spills the action into the wings, wrapping you in the story like a festival crowd that just won’t let you go. It’s cinema on all sides, more sides than a festival map – where every glance feels like you’re catching a new act. From sweeping landscapes to heart-pounding chases, the ScreenX stage surrounds you in a way no other screen can, turning every seat into the best view in the house.

Superscreen – So right you will need Sunscreen

SPF 100 - Sound, picture, feels. With laser projection powering vast wall-to-wall screens, every frame bursts with colour and clarity you can feel. Dolby Atmos delivers sound that crowd-surfs straight to your ears, pure big screen energy, bigger than any festival headliner could dream of.

Refuel between screenings with the chart-topping snacks of the cinema world. Rollover Hot Dogs bring the longest set of the day, Pepsi Max takes the mic as the official thirst breaker, and Pick ’n’ Mix delivers 100 acts in one bag. Baskin Robbins serves up 31 flavours on one stage, and frozen ice drinks, serving frosty bangers all weekend long.

Casey Cohen, VP of International Marketing at Cineworld, said: "This weekend, Cineworld turns into a nationwide jam session for your eyeballs – where the screens are bigger, the sound is louder, the mosh pit has cup holders, and every film is a main act. Come celebrate the last big weekend of summer for just £4 a ticket in all formats. This weekend belongs to the big screen."

Two days. All films. All formats. Only £4. Exclusively at Cineworld. We’ll See You in the Dark.

BOOK YOUR TICKETS TODAY BEFORE IT’S TOO LATE!
summary: Cineworld’s Big Screen Weekend: Two Days of Cinema Glory is set to take place nationwide on August 30 and 31, with cinema tickets for just £4 for all films in all formats. This is a limited time offer. Every Cineworld cinema in the UK will transform into a two-day celebration of cinema's biggest line-ups, with IMAX as the biggest stage of them all, 4DX as the only stage with wind machines, ScreenX as the panorama stage, and Superscreen so bright that you will need sunscreen. The event will also feature new headliners like Caught Stealing, Eddington, The Life of Chuck, The Roses and The Fantastic Four: First Steps.
shortSummary: Cineworld’s Big Screen Weekend offers cinema tickets for just £4 across the UK, highlighting cinema's biggest stages and immersive experiences with limited availability.

argos_summary: Cineworld is offering a two‑day "Big Screen Weekend" across the UK on August 30‑31, with tickets for all films in all formats available for just £4. The promotion highlights IMAX, 4DX, ScreenX, and Superscreen experiences, and features a mix of new releases and returning summer blockbusters such as "The Fantastic Four: First Steps," "Jurassic World: Rebirth," and "How To Train Your Dragon." The event is marketed as a nationwide cinematic celebration, encouraging patrons to enjoy the latest lineup in the most immersive formats at a discounted price.
